mil7.2.2:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kukkuṭassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.2.2:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kālena samayeneva cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā nahāyitvā cetiyaṃ vanditvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dassanāya gantvā kālena samayena suññāgāraṃ pavisitabbaṃ.

mil7.2.2:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kukkuṭassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.2:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, kukkuṭo kālena samayeneva vuṭṭhāti;

mil7.2.2:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kālena samayeneva vuṭṭhahitvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā cetiyaṃ vanditvā punadeva suññāgāraṃ pavisitabbaṃ.

mil7.2.2:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kukkuṭassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.2:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, kukkuṭo pathaviṃ khaṇitvā khaṇitvā ajjhohāraṃ ajjhoharati;

mil7.2.2:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena paccavekkhitvā paccavekkhitvā ajjhohāraṃ ajjhoharitabbaṃ ‘neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya, yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya vihiṃsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya, iti purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmi, yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā’ti.

mil7.2.2:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kukkuṭassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.2:5.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, kukkuṭo sacakkhukopi rattiṃ andho hoti;

mil7.2.2:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena anandheneva andhena viya bhavitabbaṃ, araññepi gocaragāme piṇḍāya carantenapi rajanīyesu rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbadhammesu andhena badhirena mūgena viya bhavitabbaṃ, na nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ, nānubyañjanaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.2:5.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kukkuṭassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.2:7.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, kukkuṭo leḍḍudaṇḍalaguḷamuggarehi paripātiyantopi sakaṃ gehaṃ na vijahati;

mil7.2.2:7.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena cīvarakammaṃ karontenapi navakammaṃ karontenapi vattappaṭivattaṃ karontenapi uddisantenapi uddisāpentenapi yoniso manasikāro na vijahitabbo, sakaṃ kho panetaṃ, mahārāja, yogino gehaṃ, yadidaṃ yoniso manasikāro.

mil7.2.2:7.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kukkuṭassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.2:7.4.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena ‘ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo?

mil7.2.3:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kalandakassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.2.3:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, kalandako paṭisattumhi opatante naṅguṭṭhaṃ papphoṭetvā mahantaṃ katvā teneva naṅguṭṭhalaguḷena paṭisattuṃ paṭibāhati;

mil7.2.3:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kilesasattumhi opatante satipaṭṭhānalaguḷaṃ papphoṭetvā mahantaṃ katvā teneva satipaṭṭhānalaguḷena sabbakilesā paṭibāhitabbā.

mil7.2.3:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kalandakassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.4:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘dīpiniyā ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.2.4:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, dīpinī sakiṃyeva gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti, na punappunaṃ purisaṃ upeti?

mil7.2.4:1.3.pli: Evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āyatiṃ paṭisandhiṃ uppattiṃ gabbhaseyyaṃ cutiṃ bhedaṃ khayaṃ vināsaṃ saṃsārabhayaṃ duggatiṃ visamaṃ sampīḷitaṃ disvā ‘punabbhave nappaṭisandahissāmī’ti yoniso manasikāro karaṇīyo.

mil7.2.4:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, dīpiniyā ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.4:1.5.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena suttanipāte dhaniyagopālakasutte—

mil7.2.5:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘dīpikassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.2.5:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, dīpiko araññe tiṇagahanaṃ vā vanagahanaṃ vā pabbatagahanaṃ vā nissāya nilīyitvā mige gaṇhāti;

mil7.2.5:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena vivekaṃ sevitabbaṃ araññaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñjaṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ vijanavātaṃ manussarāhaseyyakaṃ paṭisallānasāruppaṃ;

mil7.2.5:1.4.pli: vivekaṃ sevamāno hi, mahārāja, yogī yogāvacaro nacirasseva chaḷabhiññāsu ca vasibhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti.

mil7.2.5:1.5.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, dīpikassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.5:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, dīpiko yaṃ kiñci pasuṃ vadhitvā vāmena passena patitaṃ na bhakkheti;

mil7.2.5:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena veḷudānena vā pattadānena vā pupphadānena vā phaladānena vā sinānadānena vā mattikādānena vā cuṇṇadānena vā dantakaṭṭhadānena vā mukhodakadānena vā cātukamyatāya vā muggasupyatāya vā pāribhaṭyatāya vā jaṅghapesanīyena vā vejjakammena vā dūtakammena vā pahiṇagamanena vā piṇḍapaṭipiṇḍena vā dānānuppadānena vā vatthuvijjāya vā nakkhattavijjāya vā aṅgavijjāya vā aññataraññatarena vā buddhappaṭikuṭṭhena micchājīvena nipphāditaṃ bhojanaṃ na bhuñjitabbaṃ vāmena passena patitaṃ pasuṃ viya dīpiko.

mil7.2.5:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, dīpikassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.6:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kummassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.2.6:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, kummo udakacaro udakeyeva vāsaṃ kappeti;

mil7.2.6:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbapāṇabhūtapuggalānaṃ hitānukampinā mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ pharitvā viharitabbaṃ.

mil7.2.6:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kummassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.6:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, kummo udake uppilavanto sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā yadi koci passati, tattheva nimujjati gāḷhamogāhati ‘mā maṃ te puna passeyyun’ti;

mil7.2.6:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kilesesu opatantesu ārammaṇasare nimujjitabbaṃ gāḷhamogāhitabbaṃ ‘mā maṃ kilesā puna passeyyun’ti.

mil7.2.6:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kummassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.6:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, kummo udakato nikkhamitvā kāyaṃ otāpeti;

mil7.2.6:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena nisajjaṭṭhānasayanacaṅkamato mānasaṃ nīharitvā sammappadhāne mānasaṃ otāpetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.6:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kummassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.6:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, kummo pathaviṃ khaṇitvā vivitte vāsaṃ kappeti;

mil7.2.6:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena lābhasakkārasilokaṃ pajahitvā suññaṃ vivittaṃ kānanaṃ vanapatthaṃ pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ pavivittamogāhitvā vivitte yeva vāsaṃ upagantabbaṃ.

mil7.2.6:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kummassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.6:6.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, kummo cārikaṃ caramāno yadi kañci passati vā, saddaṃ suṇāti vā, soṇḍipañcamāni aṅgāni sake kapāle nidahitvā appossukko tuṇhībhūto tiṭṭhati kāyamanurakkhanto;

mil7.2.6:6.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbattha rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbadhammesu āpatantesu chasu dvāresu saṃvarakavāṭaṃ anugghāṭetvā mānasaṃ samodahitvā saṃvaraṃ katvā satena sampajānena vihātabbaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ anurakkhamānena.

mil7.2.6:6.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kummassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.6:6.4.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena saṃyuttanikāyavare kummūpamasuttante—

mil7.2.7:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘vaṃsassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.2.7:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, vaṃso yattha vāto, tattha anulometi, nāññatthamanudhāvati;

mil7.2.7:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yaṃ buddhena bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ, taṃ anulomayitvā kappiye anavajje ṭhatvā samaṇadhammaṃyeva pariyesitabbaṃ.

mil7.2.7:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vaṃsassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.8:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘cāpassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.2.8:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, cāpo sutacchito namito yāvaggamūlaṃ samakameva anunamati nappaṭitthambhati;

mil7.2.8:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena theranavamajjhimasamakesu anunamitabbaṃ nappaṭipharitabbaṃ.

mil7.2.8:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cāpassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.8:1.5.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena vidhura (puṇṇaka) jātake—

mil7.2.9:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘vāyasassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.2.9:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āsaṅkitaparisaṅkitena yattapayattena upaṭṭhitāya satiyā saṃvutehi indriyehi caritabbaṃ.

mil7.2.9:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vāyasassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.2.9:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, vāyaso yaṃ kiñci bhojanaṃ disvā ñātīhi saṃvibhajitvā bhuñjati;

mil7.2.9:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ye te lābhā dhammikā dhammaladdhā antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampi, tathārūpehi lābhehi paṭivibhattabhoginā bhavitabbaṃ sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi.

mil7.2.9:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, vāyasassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.1:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘lābulatāya ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.3.1:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, lābulatā tiṇe vā kaṭṭhe vā latāya vā soṇḍikāhi ālambitvā tassūpari vaḍḍhati;

mil7.3.1:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena arahatte abhivaḍḍhitukāmena manasā ārammaṇaṃ ālambitvā arahatte abhivaḍḍhitabbaṃ.

mil7.3.1:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, lābulatāya ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.10:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘samuddassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.3.10:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, mahāsamuddo matena kuṇapena saddhiṃ na saṃvasati;

mil7.3.10:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhimakkhapaḷāsaissāmacchariyamāyāsāṭheyyakuṭilavisamaduccaritakilesamalehi saddhiṃ na saṃvasitabbaṃ.

mil7.3.10:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, samuddassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.10:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, mahāsamuddo muttāmaṇiveḷuriyasaṅkhasilāpavāḷaphalikamaṇivividharatananicayaṃ dhārento pidahati, na bahi vikirati;

mil7.3.10:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena maggaphalajhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattivipassanābhiññāvividhaguṇaratanāni adhigantvā pidahitabbāni, na bahi nīharitabbāni.

mil7.3.10:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, samuddassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.10:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, mahāsamuddo mahantehi mahābhūtehi saddhiṃ saṃvasati;

mil7.3.10:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena appicchaṃ santuṭṭhaṃ dhutavādaṃ sallekhavuttiṃ ācārasampannaṃ lajjiṃ pesalaṃ garuṃ bhāvanīyaṃ vattāraṃ vacanakkhamaṃ codakaṃ pāpagarahiṃ ovādakaṃ anusāsakaṃ viññāpakaṃ sandassakaṃ samādapakaṃ samuttejakaṃ sampahaṃsakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ sabrahmacāriṃ nissāya vasitabbaṃ.

mil7.3.10:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, mahāsamuddassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.10:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, mahāsamuddo navasalilasampuṇṇāhi gaṅgāyamunāaciravatīsarabhūmahīādīhi nadīsatasahassehi antalikkhe saliladhārāhi ca pūritopi sakaṃ velaṃ nātivattati;

mil7.3.10:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena lābhasakkārasilokavandanamānanapūjanakāraṇā jīvitahetupi sañcicca sikkhāpadavītikkamo na karaṇīyo.

mil7.3.10:4.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, mahāsamuddassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.10:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī’ti.

mil7.3.10:6.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, mahāsamuddo sabbasavantīhi gaṅgāyamunāaciravatīsarabhūmahīhi antalikkhe udakadhārāhipi na paripūrati;

mil7.3.10:6.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena uddesaparipucchāsavanadhāraṇavinicchayaabhidhammavinayagāḷhasuttantaviggahapadanikkhepapadasandhi padavibhattinavaṅgajinasāsanavaraṃ suṇantenāpi na tappitabbaṃ.

mil7.3.10:6.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, mahāsamuddassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.2:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘padumassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.3.2:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, padumaṃ udake jātaṃ udake saṃvaddhaṃ anupalittaṃ udakena;

mil7.3.2:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kule gaṇe lābhe yase sakkāre sammānanāya paribhogapaccayesu ca sabbattha anupalittena bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.3.2:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, padumassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.2:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, padumaṃ udakā accuggamma ṭhāti;

mil7.3.2:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbalokaṃ abhibhavitvā accuggamma lokuttaradhamme ṭhātabbaṃ.

mil7.3.2:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, padumassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.2:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, padumaṃ appamattakenapi anilena eritaṃ calati;

mil7.3.2:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena appamattakesupi kilesesu saṃyamo karaṇīyo, bhayadassāvinā viharitabbaṃ.

mil7.3.2:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, padumassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.2:3.4.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena ‘aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū’”ti.

mil7.3.3:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘bījassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.3.3:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, bījaṃ appakampi samānaṃ bhaddake khette vuttaṃ deve sammā dhāraṃ pavecchante subahūni phalāni anudassati;

mil7.3.3:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yathā paṭipāditaṃ sīlaṃ kevalaṃ sāmaññaphalamanudassati.

mil7.3.3:1.5.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bījassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.3:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, bījaṃ suparisodhite khette ropitaṃ khippameva saṃvirūhati;

mil7.3.3:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena mānasaṃ supariggahitaṃ suññāgāre parisodhitaṃ satipaṭṭhānakhettavare khittaṃ khippameva virūhati.

mil7.3.3:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, bījassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.4:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘sālakalyāṇikāya ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.3.4:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, sālakalyāṇikā nāma antopathaviyaṃyeva abhivaḍḍhati hatthasatampi bhiyyopi;

mil7.3.4:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena cattāri sāmaññaphalāni catasso paṭisambhidā chaḷabhiññāyo kevalañca samaṇadhammaṃ suññāgāreyeva paripūrayitabbaṃ.

mil7.3.4:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sālakalyāṇikāya ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.5:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘nāvāya tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.3.5:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, nāvā bahuvidhadārusaṅghāṭasamavāyena bahumpi janaṃ tārayati;

mil7.3.5:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ācārasīlaguṇavattappaṭivattabahuvidhadhammasaṅghāṭasamavāyena sadevako loko tārayitabbo.

mil7.3.5:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, nāvāya paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.5:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena bahuvidhakilesaūmivegaṃ lābhasakkārayasasilokapūjanavandanā parakulesu nindāpasaṃsāsukhadukkhasammānanavimānanabahuvidhadosaūmivegañca sahitabbaṃ.

mil7.3.5:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, nāvāya dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.5:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, nāvā aparimitamanantamapāramakkhobhitagambhīre mahatimahāghose timitimiṅgalamakaramacchagaṇākule mahatimahāsamudde carati;

mil7.3.5:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena tiparivaṭṭadvādasākāracatusaccābhisamayappaṭivedhe mānasaṃ sañcārayitabbaṃ.

mil7.3.5:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, nāvāya tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.5:3.4.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena saṃyuttanikāyavare saccasaṃyutte—

mil7.3.5:4.1.pli: ‘Vitakkentā ca kho tumhe, bhikkhave, “idaṃ dukkhan”ti vitakkeyyātha, “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti vitakkeyyātha, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti vitakkeyyātha, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti vitakkeyyāthā’”ti.

mil7.3.6:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘nāvālagganakassa dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.3.6:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, nāvālagganakaṃ bahuūmijālākulavikkhobhitasalilatale mahatimahāsamudde nāvaṃ laggeti ṭhapeti, na deti disāvidisaṃ harituṃ;

mil7.3.6:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena rāgadosamohūmijāle mahatimahāvitakkasampahāre cittaṃ laggetabbaṃ, na dātabbaṃ disāvidisaṃ harituṃ.

mil7.3.6:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, nāvālagganakassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.6:2.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, nāvālagganakaṃ na plavati visīdati, hatthasatepi udake nāvaṃ laggeti ṭhānamupaneti;

mil7.3.6:2.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena lābhayasasakkāramānanavandanapūjanaapacitīsu lābhaggayasaggepi na plavitabbaṃ, sarīrayāpanamattake yeva cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.6:2.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, nāvālagganakassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.7:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kūpassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.3.7:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, kūpo rajjuñca varattañca laṅkārañca dhāreti;

mil7.3.7:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena satisampajaññasamannāgatena bhavitabbaṃ, abhikkante paṭikkante ālokite vilokite samiñjite pasārite saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe asite pīte khāyite sāyite uccārapassāvakamme gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārinā bhavitabbaṃ.

mil7.3.7:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kūpassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.7:1.5.pli: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena ‘sato, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya sampajāno, ayaṃ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanī’”ti.

mil7.3.8:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘niyāmakassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?

mil7.3.8:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, niyāmako rattindivaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ appamatto yattappayatto nāvaṃ sāreti;

mil7.3.8:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena cittaṃ niyāmayamānena rattindivaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ appamattena yattappayattena yoniso manasikārena cittaṃ niyāmetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.8:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, niyāmakassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.8:3.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, niyāmakassa yaṃ kiñci mahāsamudde kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā, sabbaṃ taṃ viditaṃ hoti;

mil7.3.8:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kusalākusalaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ hīnappaṇītaṃ kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgaṃ vijānitabbaṃ.

mil7.3.8:3.3.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, niyāmakassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.8:4.1.pli: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, niyāmako yante muddikaṃ deti ‘mā koci yantaṃ āmasitthā’ti;

mil7.3.8:4.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena citte saṃvaramuddikā dātabbā ‘mā kiñci pāpakaṃ akusalavitakkaṃ vitakkesī’ti, idaṃ, mahārāja, niyāmakassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

mil7.3.8:4.4.pli: ‘mā, bhikkhave, pāpake akusale vitakke vitakkeyyātha, seyyathidaṃ—

mil7.3.9:1.1.pli: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kammakārassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?

mil7.3.9:1.2.pli: “Yathā, mahārāja, kammakāro evaṃ cintayati ‘bhatako ahaṃ imāya nāvāya kammaṃ karomi, imāyāhaṃ nāvāya vāhasā bhattavetanaṃ labhāmi, na me pamādo karaṇīyo, appamādena me ayaṃ nāvā vāhetabbā’ti;

mil7.3.9:1.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena evaṃ cintayitabbaṃ ‘imaṃ kho ahaṃ cātumahābhūtikaṃ kāyaṃ sammasanto satataṃ samitaṃ appamatto upaṭṭhitassati sato sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto jātijarābyādhimaraṇasokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsehi parimuccissāmīti appamādo me karaṇīyo’ti.

mil7.3.9:1.4.pli: Idaṃ, mahārāja, kammakārassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
